jobDescription: Venture Capital investment analyst position at the world's leading early-stage frontier technology venture capital firm. We are seeking candidates with 2-3 years experience in investing, investment banking or management consulting and a passion for cutting-edge technology. If you are creative, energetic, and analytical, and if you would like to help us continue investing in world-class startup technology companies like Robinhood, SpaceX, Patreon and Jaunt, we look forward to your application!
